verses.text: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* Juda \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w pen|strong="H5842"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w point|strong="H6856"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w diamond|strong="H8068"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* graven \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* table \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* groves, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w* mountains,

Sacrificing \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H2428"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0957"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* thy \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H5414"\w* stripped \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou knowest \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w kindled|strong="H6919"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w burn|strong="H3344"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* maketh \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* departeth \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* tamaric \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w desert|strong="H6160"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* dryness \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w desert|strong="H6160"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w salt|strong="H4420"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* trusteth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* spreadeth \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* towards moisture: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heat|strong="H2527"\w* cometh. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w drought|strong="H1226"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* solicitous, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w cease|strong="H4185"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w any|strong="H1961"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* perverse \w above|strong="H3820"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* unsearchable, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*?

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w search|strong="H2713"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* prove \w the|strong="H5414"\w* reins: \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w according|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* devices.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w partridge|strong="H7124"\w* hath hatched \w eggs|strong="H1716"\w* which \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w lay|strong="H1961"\w*: \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* hath gathered \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*: \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w midst|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w end|strong="H0319"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fool|strong="H5036"\w*.

A \w high|strong="H4791"\w* \w and|strong="H4725"\w* glorious \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w from|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4725"\w* \w beginning|strong="H7223"\w* \w is|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4725"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H3678"\w* our sanctification:

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hope \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* depart \w from|strong="H3478"\w* thee, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* vein \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w living|strong="H2416"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*: \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*? \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* troubled, \w following|strong="H0310"\w* thee \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* pastor, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w desired|strong="H0183"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* man, thou knowest. \w That|strong="H3045"\w* which \w went|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, hath \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w right|strong="H5227"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* thou \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w terror|strong="H4288"\w* unto \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, thou art \w my|strong="H1961"\w* hope \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* affliction.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*: \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* afraid, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* afraid: \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* affliction, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w double|strong="H4932"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7451"\w*, \w destroy|strong="H7665"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, ye \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w Take|strong="H5375"\w* \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* \w no|strong="H0408"\w* burdens \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* burdens \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* ye \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*: \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w hardened|strong="H7185"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w neck|strong="H6203"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* might \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* might \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w instruction|strong="H4148"\w*.
